case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Near complete or complete skeleton
case_address_found_2: 2.0 miles on Forest Service Road, southeast of mile post 12 on State Route 289
case_circumstances: Incomplete and decomposed remains were found on a known migrant trail (PCOME case ML10-00296).  Two months later a mandible was recovered very near to above location (PCOME ML10-00726).  DNA analyses linked these two accessions.  On 4 March 2012, a right scapula (PCOME case ML12-00526, NamUs UP#10267) was recovered.  This bone is linked to this decedent via DNA analyses.

case_other_items_with_body: Black earbud headphones;  Two "Energizer" AAA batteries; A spool of black thread- packed within the spool of thread is a piece of paper with a phone number: "520-409-3851"
